Akan Perbarui Sistem e-Budgeting, Anies: Publik Bisa Komentar
01 Nov 2019, 18:22 by Dwi Andayani
Jakarta - Gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan menyebut akan memperbarui sistem e-budgeting. Anies menuturkan nantinya masyarakat dapat memberikan komentar di sistem baru ini.
"Yang akan dilakukan adalah upgrade, agar tetap anggaran itu nanti bisa diakses. Bahkan bukan hanya bisa dilihat, tapi juga bisa memberikan komentar langsung. Kalau saat ini publik itu hanya bisa lihat tapi tidak bisa memberikan (komentar)," ujar Anies di Balai Kota DKI Jakarta, Jl Medan Merdeka Selatan, Jakarta, Jumat (1/11/2019).
Anies mengatakan pihaknya akan mengedepankan prinsip transparansi. Selain itu, dia menyebut e-budgeting akan dibuat lebih canggih atau smart.
"Kita mengedepankan prinsip transparansi akuntabilitas dan smart system, itu kita pegang," ujar Anies.
Anies menyebut upaya upgrade atau pembaruan e-budgeting bukan baru dilakukan setelah adanya kesalahan penginputan anggaran. Namun, menurutnya, hal ini telah lama disiapkan dan akan diluncurkan pada akhir tahun.
"Itu sudah dikerjakan, jadi akan digunakan Januari. Artinya, tidak dibikin karena ada keramaian, bukan. Itu sudah dikerjakan setahun lebih, sudah direncanakan akan di-launching akhir tahun ini," tuturnya.
Anies mengatakan sistem e-budgeting ini sama dengan aplikasi yang membutuhkan pembaruan, sehingga dia menegaskan tidak meniadakan, tapi memperbarui.
"Tapi intinya seperti kalau kita memiliki aplikasi, aplikasi selalu mengalami perkembangan, jadi ya normal saja. Jadi bukan mengganti, tapi upgrade. Kalau ganti, pesannya meniadakan, bukan. Tapi meng-upgrade saja, sehingga sistemnya smart," tuturnya.

Will Update the e-Budgeting System, Anies: The Public Can Comment
Nov 01 2019, 18:22 by Dwi Andayani
Jakarta - DKI Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan said he would renew the e-budgeting system. Anies said that later the community could comment on this new system.
"What will be done is an upgrade, so that the budget can be accessed later. In fact, it can not only be seen, but also can provide direct comments. At the moment the public can only see but cannot provide (comments)," said Anies at City Hall DKI Jakarta, Jl Medan Merdeka Selatan, Jakarta, Friday (11/01/2019).
Anies said that his party would prioritize the principle of transparency. In addition, he said e-budgeting would be made more sophisticated or smart.
"We put forward the principle of transparency of accountability and smart systems, that we hold," said Anies.
Anies said that the effort to upgrade or update e-budgeting was not only done after an error in inputing the budget. However, according to him, this has long been prepared and will be launched at the end of the year.
"It has been done, so it will be used in January. That is, it was not made because there was a crowd, no. It has been done for more than a year, it is planned to be launched later this year," he said.
Anies said that the e-budgeting system is the same as an application that requires an update, so he emphasized that it does not eliminate, but it does update.
"But the point is as if we have an application, the application is always experiencing development, so it's normal. So it's not replacing, but upgrading. If you change, the message will cancel, no. But just upgrade, so the system is smart," he said.
